description: A special drug created by Tony Tony Chopper that alters the wavelength of Devil Fruit transformations, allowing him to access additional transformation points beyond the standard three Zoan forms. Taking more than one within six hours increases the effect, but taking three within six hours triggers an uncontrollable transformation.
creator: chopper

keyMoments.title: Chopper Takes Third Rumble Ball
keyMoments.description: Chopper consumes a third Rumble Ball within six hours, crossing the forbidden threshold and triggering the Monster Point transformation.
keyMoments.significance: The first time Chopper uses three Rumble Balls, revealing the catastrophic consequences Dr. Kureha warned about and unleashing Monster Point.

keyMoments.title: Third Rumble Ball Effect Revealed
keyMoments.description: The effect of the third Rumble Ball is fully revealed as Chopper transforms into Monster Point, a massive uncontrollable creature representing 'the rampage of the Devil Fruit.'
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the dangerous limitation of Rumble Balls and shows that Chopper's pharmaceutical creation has both incredible potential and terrible risks.

abilities: Grants access to additional Devil Fruit transformation points
First Rumble Ball: Enables four additional transformations (Horn Point, Arm Point, Jump Point, Guard Point)
Second Rumble Ball within 6 hours: Enhanced transformations with greater power
Third Rumble Ball within 6 hours: Triggers Monster Point - uncontrollable rampage form
limitations: Effects last only 3 minutes per dose
Taking two within six hours enhances effects but increases risk
Taking three within six hours causes complete loss of control and triggers Monster Point
Monster Point destroys the user's body and attacks indiscriminately
After using three Rumble Balls, Chopper cannot move for several hours

reveals.information: The catastrophic effect of taking three Rumble Balls within six hours - triggering Monster Point and complete loss of control

trivia: The Rumble Ball was developed by Chopper during his training with Dr. Kureha on Drum Island
Chopper is the first known Devil Fruit user to create a drug that artificially enhances Devil Fruit abilities
The mushroom-like appearance of the Rumble Ball mirrors the appearance of Devil Fruits
Post-timeskip, Chopper masters Monster Point and only needs one Rumble Ball to access it with control
